inscription:
Inscription

LLC, in black chalk (or graphite?): [68]

Inscribed on lost backing

[Taddeo Zuccaro], see Mundy and Moir notes
medium: Black chalk, pen, and dark brown ink, brush and wash, squared in black chalk, framing lines in pen and brown ink, laid down
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, July 3, 1980, no. 16, bought in. Sale, Sotheby's, London, March 25, 1982, no. 16, for £2, 135, to Shanaugh Fitzgerald for Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1982-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Rest on the Flight into Egypt
